abstract: How did Citigroup trounce JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America? Breakingviews takes a look at the megabank’s best showing in almost three years.
snippet: How did Citigroup trounce JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America? Breakingviews takes a look at the megabank’s best showing in almost three years.
lead_paragraph: How did Citigroup trounce JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America?

abstract: Christian Meissner, a high-ranking investment banker at Nomura, has left the Japanese firm to join Bank of America Merrill Lynch as its head of investment banking for Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
snippet: Christian Meissner, a high-ranking investment banker at Nomura, has left the Japanese firm to join Bank of America Merrill Lynch as its head of investment banking for Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
lead_paragraph: Christian Meissner, a high-ranking investment banker at Nomura, has left the Japanese firm to join Bank of America Merrill Lynch as its head of investment banking for Europe, the Middle East and Africa.

headline.main: Nomura’s Meissner to Join BofA Merrill
